posts.post_content:
I know this is a long shot and I’m not real sure it’s posted in the correct sub forum, but I’m looking to trade my ungraded 2011 Bowman Chrome draft Mike Trout refractor rookie for a lower grade (doesn’t have to actually be graded) T-206 Mathewson, Young or Nap. Hoping one of you collects all eras like I do and we can swing a trade that we’re both happy with. If anyone is interested I will PM pics. 

JP
